data.name: NotIDOwner
data.value: You are not the owner of this ID.

data.name: IDNowPublic
data.value: The ID is now public and everyone can use it. You can set it back to private with `makeprivate <ID>`

data.name: IDNowPrivate
data.value: The ID is now private and and only you can use it. You can set it back to public with `makepublic <ID>`

data.name: IDListFooter
data.value: Use 'idinfo <ID>' to get info about an adventure ID.

data.name: AboutAIDText
data.value: AI Dungeon is a first of its kind AI generated text adventure. Using a 1.5B parameter machine learning model called GPT-2, AI Dungeon generates the story and results of your actions as you play in this virtual world. Unlike virtually every other game in existence, you are not limited by the imagination of the developer in what you can do. Any thing you can express in language can be your action and the AI dungeon master will decide how the world responds to your actions.

data.name: AIDHowToPlayText
data.value: The rules of AI Dungeon are simple: 1. The game puts "You " to the front of each action so every action should start with a verb. Ex. "attack the dragon", "summon a sandwich" etc... 2. As an exception to the above: If you put your action in quotes Ex. "Will you join me on my quest ? " then the game will add "You say " to the front of it.

data.name: AIDTips
data.value: Try using new words often, the AI gets more creative with variety. Remember to start a "do" input with a verb, ex: Attack the orc. Use the undo button to delete your last input along with the AI's response. Long sentences for actions are no problem! Get creative! Want more story to generate? Use the continue command without any text. Try using new words often, the AI gets more creative with variety. Use the remember command to edit the story context that the AI always remembers. You can use Say before the text to talk.

data.value: If a user is passed, the command will try to delete all the messages from the user in the last `count` messages. The limit of days that the bot can search messages is 14.

data.name: Changelog0.9
data.value: - Added support to new languages. - New language (Spanish) - New commands (`language`, `xkcd`, `nowplaying`, `snipe`, `changelog`) - `ytrandom` now works much better. - The command list and the help command are now dynamic. - Fixed some bugs.

data.name: Changelog1.0
data.value:
- AI Dungeon system and commands, including a story ID system and auto translation. - Configuration system for some commands at guild level.
- New commands: AI Dungeon: `info`, `new`, `continue`, `revert`, `remember`, `alter`, `makepublic`, `makeprivate`, `idlist`, `idinfo`, `delete` Other: `eval`, `config`, `softban`, `tcdne`, `tpdne`, `editsnipe`, `reaction`, `seek`, `stats`, `blacklist`, `ocrtranslate`, `roleinfo`
- Support to DM channels. - Now the bot uses a proper database. - More bug fixes.

data.name: SelfNoIDs

data.name: Changelog1.1
data.value: - Remade the AI Dungeon module and API wrapper 2 times because of constant changes in the API. - New commands (`vote`, `report`, `bash`, `channelinfo`) - The owner commands now has its own module. - Now the commands' cooldown time is displayed. - Now the bot is hosted on a VPS. - Limited the music queue to 10 tracks. - `seek` now allows a time with the format `mm:ss` or `hh:mm:ss` like 30:45 or 6:23:12. - Fixed a bug that caused the bot to disconnect from a voice channel when Discord requested a reconnection. - Fixed a bug in `wikipedia` that returned error 404 when an article was not found in the current language of the bot. ...and more bug fixes.

data.name: ErrorHelp
data.value: If this keep happening please report this error in the [support server]({0}) or open an issue in the [GitHub repository]({1}) describing the error and the steps to reproduce it.

data.name: ErrorInAPI
data.value: An error occurred while calling the API.

data.name: NoChoices
data.value: You need to pass at least 1 choice.

data.name: channelinfoParam1
data.value: The channel to get info from.

data.name: UserRequireManageServer
data.value: You need the `Manage Server` permission to use this command.

data.name: badtranslatorSummary
data.value: Passes a text through a bad translator.

data.name: VersionNotFound
data.value: Version not found. The versions are: {0}

data.name: Changelog1.1.5
data.value:
- New command: `badtranslator` - Added the option to select a track before playing in `play` (disabled by default, you can enable it in `config`).
- `img` is back and it now uses DuckDuckGo image search. - `changelog` now lets you pass a specific version so it doesn't display all the version changes at once. - `serverinfo` now shows the server animated icon, if there's one.
- Edited the permission requirements for `config`, `prefix` and `language`. - Cleanup in the config and server classes.

data.name: LoopUpdated
data.value: The player was updated to repeat the track {0} times. Use this command without parameters to disable the track looping.

data.name: LoopNoValuePassed
data.value: Pass the number of times you want to repeat the track, ex: `{0}loop 5`

data.name: NowLooping
data.value: The current track will now be repeated {0} times. To disable the loop, use this command without parameters.

data.name: LoopEnded
data.value: The looping for the track: {0} has ended.

data.name: loopSummary
data.value: Repeats the current track a number of times.

data.name: loopParam1
data.value: The number of times to repeat the track.

data.name: LoopDisabled
data.value: The track looping has been disabled.

data.name: LyricsQueryNotPassed
data.value: You need to play a track or pass a track name.

data.name: PaginatorHelp
data.value: This is a paginator. React with the respective icons to change page.

data.name: AdventureDeletionPrompt
data.value: Press the button/emoji below to delete the adventure.

data.name: ReactTimeout
data.value: You did not react before the timeout!

data.name: LanguagePrompt
data.value: Select the language you want to set.

data.name: lyricsRemarks
data.value: Use `-headers` at the end of the command to keep the tags (`[info]`).

data.name: Changelog1.2
data.value:
- New commands: `calc` and `loop` (the 100th command!). - Remade `lyrics` from scratch, I've made my own parser that works a lot better than the integrated one from Victoria. The new parser also allows you to pass a specific song name instead of having to play a song before.
- `help` now shows the current command parameters types. - `stats` now shows the bot memory usage next to all the process memory usage. - `urban` now shows the links to the words. - Added more interactivity to `language`, `config`, `trivia` and `aid delete`, now handling the responses with reactions. - Better pagination system for `img`, `urban` and `lyrics`. - Now Lavalink is updated automatically to the dev builds.
- Cleanup on the localization functionality, now all the modules uses a custom command base that includes the methods needed for localization. This prevents duplicating the localization methods for each module, and the response times *should* be faster. - Small bug fixes and optimizations.

data.name: HelpFooter2
data.value: <> = Required | [] = Optional | Do not type these symbols when writing the command.

data.name: invertParam1
data.value: The url of an image to use.

data.name: Changelog1.2.3
data.value:
This update contains fixes for bugs that left 1.2 and some changes / new things that were delayed from 1.2 to improve them.
- New command: `invert` - Added Russian and Turkish languages (I've used Google Translate so the translations may have lots of errors). - Added some info about the obligatory and optional arguments in `help`. - Added a simple cache system to `img`, `tts` and `urban`.
- Now `urban` and `badtranslator` can search / translate random words for you (use the commands without passing anything). - Now the bot will only enter the typing state for long-running commands.
- Fixed a bug in `img` that occurred when the embed tried to use an "invalid" url image. - Fixed a bug in `ocr` that occurred when the image was too large. - Fixed a bug in `badtranslator` that made the command fail randomly for no reason. - Fixed a bug with the paginator that flickered in certain circumstances. - Fixed some bugs with the `lyrics` parser.

data.name: MessagesOlderThan2Weeks
data.value: Messages must be younger than two weeks.

data.name: SomeMessagesNotDeleted
data.value: {0} messages could not be deleted because they are older than two weeks.

data.name: Changelog1.2.4
data.value:
- Added a reliability service to prevent deadlocks and an auto-restart script that executes if the bot crashes.
- Limited the max. text length in `lyrics`.
- Fixed a bug in `invert` that failed in some images. - Fixed a bug in `clear` that showed a warning about messages could not be deleted even if the all the deleted messages are younger than two weeks. - Fixed a bug in `trivia` that would timeout regardless of the input.

data.name: ErrorParsingLyrics
data.value: An error occurred while parsing the lyrics for {0}. Maybe it's an instrumental?

data.name: WaitingQueue
data.value: Waiting for the queue to empty...

data.name: NewOutputPrompt
InputTypesList
data.value:
Do: An action you want to take in the story. Always start with an action, ex. "Search for the hidden treasure". This is the default option if no one is detected.
Say: You can use this to speak, ex. "Leave them alone!"
Story: This input stops the AI from putting "You" in front of your input.

data.name: Changelog1.2.7
data.value:
- New commands: `color` and `retry`.
- Added a command cache service, now you can edit a message to a new command and Fergun will update it's response or send a new one.
- Updated the AI Dungeon module and API wrapper, fixed some bugs with the responses and updated the `idinfo` and `alter` commands. Now all the commands are supported.
- Now `userinfo` and `avatar` will show the info/avatar of a user that isn't in the server by passing its ID. - Now `userinfo` and `avatar` will show the default avatar if the user doesn't have an avatar. - Now `lyrics` will show the lyrics of the current track playing in your Spotify activity, if there's one. - Now `lyrics` shows correctly the track name when an error happens. - Now it's possible to use `softban` with a user ID. - Now some commands will upload its results to Hastebin when the content is too long.
- Fixed some bugs in `tpdne`, `tcdne`, `repeat`, the command service and the paginator system.

data.name: Changelog1.2.9
data.value:
- Added a backup translator that will be automatically used when the first one fails. - Increased the command cache cleaning interval.
- Fixed a bug in `new` that prevented showing the initial prompt. - Fixed a bug in the paginator embed that prevented showing the author avatar if the user didn't have one set. - Fixed other small bugs.
- Now Fergun will respond to the command messages if before the message didn't contain any command. - Now `ping` shows the database latency.
- Reduced the memory usage.

data.name: Changelog1.3
data.value:
- New command: `dump`.
- Updated the AI Dungeon API to use WebSockets. Now the response times are a lot faster. - Updated the `new` command to use reactions instead of having to send numbers or names. - Added proper ID queue support for the AI Dungeon module.
- Removed `ocr2`.
- Fixed a bug in the command cache that made the bot reply 2 times in some commands because the command message was "updated" to include an embed or a image/video preview. - Fixed a bug in the initialization of the cache for the commands `img`, `urban` and `ytrandom` that prevented the cached results being saved. - Fixed a bug in `new` that caused the selected option to not be correct. - Fixed a bug in `avatar` and `user` that caused the commands to fail because the avatar was not found (Discord returned the cached avatar). - Fixed a bug in `img` that occurred when the embed tried to use an "invalid" url image (this time the "invalid" images will simply be discarded). - Fixed a bug in `ban` and `hackban` that caused the commands to fail when passed a guild user Id that can't be banned, returning error 403. - Fixed a bug in `badtranslator` that caused the command to fail because the target language was not found. - Fixed a bug in `badtranslator` that caused the command to enter in a infinite loop in rare cases. - Fixed a bug in `ytrandom` that caused the command to lock itself if an error occurs when creating the video cache. - Fixed a bug in `snipe` and `editsnipe` that occurred when the text was larger that 1024 characters. - Fixed a bug in `wikipedia` that occurred when trying to use the article image. - Fixed a bug in `changelog` that prevented viewing the changelog because of the way the version numbers were saved. - Fixed a bug in `skip` and `seek` that occurred when the player state was invalid. - Fixed a bug in `trivia` that caused the text to be encoded instead of decoded.
- Now `badtranslator` won't have duplicated languages.
- Reduced *more* the memory usage.

data.name: continueSummary
data.value: Continues the adventure with the provided text. If no text is passed, the AI will generate the story.

data.name: rememberSummary
data.value: Adds text to the memory context.

data.name: retrySummary
data.value: Retries the last action and generates a new response.

data.name: makepublicParam1
data.value: The adventure ID. You have to own this ID.

data.name: makeprivateParam1
data.value: The adventure ID. You have to own this ID.

data.name: idlistSummary
data.value: Gets the ID list of a user.

data.name: idlistParam1
data.value: The user to get its IDs.

data.name: dumpSummary
data.value: Dumps all the text from an ID.

data.name: Changelog1.3.3
data.value:
- Removed `someone`.
- Now Fergun will show the command help when using a command incorrectly. - Added a example to every command with parameters in the command help. - Added operating system info in `stats`.
- Fixed a bug in `ban`, `kick`, `nick` and `clear` that prevented working properly, saying that the specified user was not found. This happened because the user cache was disabled some time ago. - Fixed a bug in `clear` that would incorrectly say that there are messages older that 2 weeks when there are no messages to delete. - Fixed a bug in `resize` and `invert` that caused the commands to fail because Discord shows an invalid image preview to some urls.

data.name: Changelog1.3.6
data.value:
- New command: `cmdstats`.
- Now the `first` and `last` paginator buttons in `img` and `urban` will only appear when there are 3 or more pages, and the `jump` button when there are 4 or more pages. - Now Fergun will send a direct message to warn a user when the bot doesn't have the minimum required permissions in the current channel (`SendMessages` and `EmbedLinks`). - Now Fergun supports multiple user activities, this is useful in `userinfo` and `lyrics` (when the Spotify activity is hidden by the custom status). - Added ratelimit and required permissions info in the command help.
- Fixed a bug in `wikipedia` that caused the command to fail because the query was not encoded in some cases. - Fixed a bug in `screenshot` that caused the command to fail because the url was encoded by error. - Fixed a bug in the AI Dungeon module that caused the commands to fail when different IDs were used at the same time.

data.name: lmgtfySummary
data.value: Let me Google that for you.

data.name: bigsnipeSummary
data.value: Shows the last deleted messages in the current channel or the specified.

data.name: bigeditsnipeSummary
data.value: Shows the last edited messages in the current channel or the specified.

data.name: disableSummary
data.value: Disables a command locally (for this server).

data.name: disableParam1
data.value: The name of the command to disable.

data.name: CommandDisabled
data.value: The command {0} has been disabled in this server.

data.name: enableSummary
data.value: Enables a command locally (for this server).

data.name: enableParam1
data.value: The name of the command to enable.

data.name: CommandEnabled
data.value: The command {0} has been enabled in this server.

data.name: globaldisableSummary
data.value: Disables a command globally (in all servers).

data.name: globaldisableParam1
data.value: The name of the command to disable globally.

data.name: CommandDisabledGlobally
data.value: The command {0} has been disabled in all servers.

data.name: globalenableSummary
data.value: Enables a command globally (in all servers).

data.name: globalenableParam1
data.value: The name of the command to enable globally.

data.name: CommandEnabledGlobally
data.value: The command {0} has been enabled in all servers.

data.name: LeftVCInactivity
data.value: I have left the voice channel due to inactivity.

data.name: MusicPlayerShutdownWarning
data.value: Fergun will be restarted/turned off in some seconds and your music player will be shut down. Sorry for the inconvenience.

data.name: PublicIdNull
data.value: The public ID of this adventure is null. Please create a new adventure.

data.name: Changelog1.4
data.value:
- New commands: `bigsnipe`, `bigeditsnipe`, `lmgtfy`, `paste`, `enable`, `disable`, `globalenable` and `globaldisable`.
- Now when Fergun joins a server and that server has a preferred locale, that locale will be saved to the Fergun configuration for that server. - Now when Fergun leaves a server, that server config will be deleted from the database. - Now Fergun will leave a voice channel when all the users leave that channel. - Now Fergun will send a warning to all servers that has a music player before restarting/shutting down. - Now the commands that uses Hastebin and the upload fails its content will be showed in the message, but cut down.
- Added support to disable commands at guild level. - Added support to voice channels, category channels and DM channels in `channelinfo`. - Added support to deleted attachments in `snipe` (`bigsnipe` comes with this feature on release).
- Updated the `lyrics` scraper and fixed the cut text bug. - Updated the AI Dungeon module and API wrapper.
- Fixed a bug that caused some moderation commands to fail because the user hierarchy was calculated incorrectly.

data.name: giveSummary
data.value: Gives (transfers) the specified ID to a user.

data.name: giveParam2
data.value: The user to give the ID.

data.name: CannotGiveYourself
data.value: You cannot give the ID yourself!

data.name: CannotGiveToBot
data.value: You cannot give the ID to a bot!

data.name: GaveId
data.value: The ID was successfully transferred to {0}.

data.name: Changelog1.4.8
data.value:
- New command: `give`.
- Updated the AI Dungeon module and API wrapper (again), fixed the custom adventure bug, and fixed `alter`. - Updated the Google TTS library, now using preprocessors and tokenizers ported from gTTS Python library. This provides correct intonation and pronunciation, and also allows making TTS with larger texts. - Improved the lyrics scraper.
- Now Fergun will leave a voice channel if there are only bots in that channel. - Now `roleinfo` will show '?' and '~x' total users when the guild cache isn't complete.
- Fixed activities and active clients not showing in `userinfo`. - Fixed a bug in `lyrics` that caused the "-headers" option from being ignored when only that was passed. - Fixed a bug in `wikipedia` that occurred with some articles. - Fixed a bug in `img` that occurred when a !Bang was triggered. - Fixed a bug in `img` that occurred when a large text was passed. - Fixed a rare bug in the paginator that occurred when the user that added a reaction wasn't cached. - Fixed a bug in `trivia` that occurred when the command was used simultaneously. - Fixed a rare bug in `ocr` and `ocrtranslate` that occurred when a corrupted image was used. - Lots of other bug fixes.

data.name: ValueNotSetInConfig
data.value: The value of `{0}` has not been established in the config. If this problem persists, contact the developers.

data.name: NoAvailableLanguages
data.value: It seems there are no available languages.

data.name: DiscordServerErrorInfo
data.value: The command failed due to an issue on Discord's side. Please try again later.

data.name: LavalinkNotConnected
data.value: Could not connect to the Lavalink server. Please try again later.

data.name: NoPresenceIntent
data.value: Cannot get Spotify status because I don't have the Guild Presences intent.

data.name: NoSpotifyStatus
data.value: No Spotify status found for user {0}.

data.name: spotifySummary
data.value: Gets the Spotify status info of a user.

data.name: spotifyParam1
data.value: The user to get its Spotify status info.

data.name: wolframalphaSummary
data.value: Gets a response from Wolfram|Alpha based on the query.

data.name: archiveSummary
data.value: Gets a screenshot of a website in the specified year/month/day using a timestamp.

data.name: archiveParam1
data.value: The Url of the website to take a screenshot.

data.name: archiveParam2
data.value: A timestamp with the specified format.

data.name: TimestampFormat
data.value: The timestamp must have format `YYYYMMDDhhmmss`, where `YYYY` is required and the other values are optional.

data.name: NoSnapshots
data.value: No snapshots found for specified url and timestamp.

data.name: CouldNotFindLine
data.value: Could not find the command method line.

data.name: Changelog1.6
data.value:
- Fergun is now open source! - New commands: `wolframalpha`, `spotify`, `define`, `archive`, `shorten`, and `blacklistserver`. - Added back `youtube`. - Lots of internal changes to make the bot easy to self-host.
- Added a prefix cache system. Now the response times should be faster. - [help] Added a command list cache. - [stats] Improved the methods to get the bot memory usage. - [repeat] Improved the performance, limiting the maximum possible length of text to avoid allocating memory unnecessarily. - Improved the performance of the logging and interactive service. - [cmdstats] Reduced the number of commands displayed per page. - [calc] Now using a different math library. - [urban] Now can be used in non-NSFW channels. - [code] Rewrote to get a link pointing to the specified command method line from the repository.
- [userinfo] Fixed a bug that caused the activity field to be empty if the user had an emote in their status. - [lyrics] Fixed a bug in the parser that caused bold text to be overlapped. - [give] Fixed a bug that allowed to give IDs to bots. - Fixed some bugs in the Bing Translator wrapper.
- [new] Removed the character limit in the custom mode creation. - [alter] Removed the character limit. - Removed the paginator/video cache. - Removed the word list that `badtranslator` used. - Removed `nothing` and `botcolor`.
- Now Fergun will send a warning message when a command fails due to a 5xx error. - Now Fergun will send a warning message when a music command is used when there's no connection to a Lavalink server. - Now when editing a command message with a paginator, the response message will be deleted if the reactions cannot be removed. - Now when editing a command message to a command that attaches files, the "Loading" message will be correctly deleted. - Lots of minor bug fixes.

data.name: privacySummary
data.value: Displays the privacy policy and the privacy configuration.

data.name: WhatDataWeCollectList
data.value: a. Server configuration (server ID, custom prefix, bot language, disabled commands, etc) b. User configuration/stats (user ID, Trivia game points, privacy configuration and blacklist status) c. AI Dungeon adventures (adventure ID, owner ID and availability of use) d. Temporary collection of deleted/edited messages, used in the "snipe" commands (`snipe`, `editsnipe`, `bigsnipe` and `bigeditsnipe`)

data.name: WhenWeCollectDataList
data.value: a. When you set a custom prefix, language, or other configuration. This data is removed when the bot leaves that server. b. When you play a Trivia game, you use the privacy configuration or you're blacklisted. c. When you create an AI Dungeon adventure with the bot. This data is removed when you use the `aid delete` command. d. When a message is deleted/edited. These messages can only be seen using the "snipe" commands in the channel where the message was deleted/edited. These messages are only stored for 6 hours, and you can decide to opt out using the reactions below.

data.name: PrivacyConfigInfo
data.value: Here you'll find some settings that you can change to improve your privacy.

data.name: PrivacyConfigList
data.value: Opt out of the temporary collection of deleted/edited messages in the "snipe" commands

data.name: SnipePrivacy
data.value: Don't want your message to be displayed here? See `privacy`.
